jd: From: Hemant Rawat, convextech hemant@convextech.com Reply to: hemant@convextech.com Title: Mobile Applications Developer – Flutter, .NETLocation:Hybrid(Irving, TX)Duration: 6 months contractVisa Restrictions: No H1b/CPTMode of Interview: 1 internal video interview & 2 Client Rounds via video Job Description: Responsibilities:Design and develop applications built using Flutter framework, Dart, firebase. Good experience in API integration and accessibility. Experience in Apium, Dart and exposure to Azure cloud technologies would be a plus. Experience in building enterprise scale application using TDD approach. Work in Agile environment and good experience working on Safe Agile practice. Team player with good communication working directly with agile product teams. Coordinate with scrum masters, customer experience stakeholders and testing team. Required Expeirence and Skills:Tools/ Framework: Flutter , NodeJS , Appium ,Dart . Integration patterns: REST APIs (OpenAPI 3.0), Graph QL. CICD: Azure DevOps Services (Repos, pipelines), SonarSource (security), Jfrog (artifact management)Experience building API layer using .Net (C#) . Experience building mobile app with Flutter framework. Experience in delivering work in an Agile environment . Retail experience would be nice to have.
